name: Farmhouse Pizza
description: Three-day sourdough crust made with Farmer Ground flour from Ithaca, local mozzarella cheese and tomato sauce made with tomatoes and herbs from 9 Miles East Farm and our friends' farms in season.

name: Barnyard Pizza
description: Local Italian sausage, house tomato sauce, creamy mozzarella, three-day sourdough crust made with Farmer Ground flour from Ithaca

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Nitrate-free pepperoni from Black River Smokehouse, house tomato sauce, creamy mozzarella, three-day sourdough crust made with Farmer Ground flour

name: Simple Salad
description: Organic baby greens, farm-made herb vinaigrette, pumpkin seeds. Very simple, very healthy.

name: Seasons pizza: Hot Honey
description: Farm-made tomato sauce, local mozzarella, and spicy/sweet hot honey on our three-day sourdough crust.

name: Seasons Pizza: Sauteed mushroom
description:
Classic mushroom pizza: freshly sauteed mushrooms, creamy mozzarella, farm-made tomato sauce

Three-day sourdough crust made with Farmer Ground flour from Ithaca.

name: Extra Dressing
description: House-made vinaigrettes

name: Breakfast Hero
description: Scrambled eggs, roasted veg, herb pesto, cheese & ham. Served on our house-baked sourdough roll.

name: Grilled Ham Sandwich
description: Nitrate-free ham, dijon mustard, fontina cheese, dill pickle. Served on our house-baked sourdough roll.

name: Salmon Sunday Sandwich
description: Cold-smoked salmon, cream cheese, tomato, red onion, capers. Served on our house sourdough pagnotelle.

name: Turkey Sandwich
description: House brined & roasted VT turkey breast, greens, dill pickle, fontina cheese and tomato aioli. Served on our house-baked sourdough roll.

name: "Indecision" Meal Deal
description: One Farmhouse pizza, four pieces of grilled chicken over garlic mashed root veg, a simple salad with organic baby greens and herb vinaigrette, and two bakery desserts.

name: Argentinian Sandwich
description: Grilled Walden Meats chorizo sausage, chimichurri, crunchy veg. Served on our house sourdough roll.

name: Chicken Chopped Salad
description: Another lunchtime favorite from the cafe is now available for delivery. Grilled chicken, grilled veggies, baby greens, herb vinaigrette and pumpkin seeds. Gluten free.

name: Vegantinian
description: Grilled portobello mushrooms, chimichurri, crunchy veg. Served on our house sourdough roll.

name: Piri Piri Grilled Chicken
description: Portuguese style of spicy, bone-in chicken popular in Montreal and London. Spicy but not crazy. Served over garlic mashed root veg. Delivered hot and ready to eat. Available from 4-9pm only.

name: Grilled Lemon Rosemary Chicken Dinner
description: Three bone-in pieces of lemon rosemary chicken with herb pesto.  Served over garlic mashed root veg. Delivered hot and ready to eat. Available between 4 - 9pm only.

name: Steak with Chimichurri
description: Grilled grass-fed hanger steak over roasted root veg with chimichurri Argentinean pesto. Delivered hot and ready to eat. Gluten-free.

name: Chirashi Bowl w/ Steelhead Salmon
description: Chirashi bowl with local steelhead from Hudson Valley Fisheries (raw preparation), root veg, whole grain rice and maple soy glaze.

name: Sauteed Salmon w/Lime Maple Glaze
description: Fresh local steelhead salmon filet from Hudson Valley Fisheries, plated over garlic mashed root veg with lime maple glaze. Delivered hot and ready to eat.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Organic pearl barley, wild mushroom blend, mushroom stock, porcini, shaved parm. Ready to enjoy.

name: Winter Salad
description: Organic baby greens topped with roasted beets, Maplebrook feta cheese, preserved lemon, red cabbage, toasted walnuts, herb vinaigrette.

name: Winter Salad w/chicken
description: Organic baby greens topped with roasted beets, Maplebrook feta cheese, preserved lemon, red cabbage, toasted walnuts, herb vinaigrette. Topped with roasted chicken breast

name: Winter Salad w/grilled steak
description: A favorite returns! Organic baby greens topped with roasted beets, Maplebrook feta cheese, preserved lemon, red cabbage, pumpkin seeds, grilled grass-fed steak, and herb vinaigrette.

name: Chirashi Bowl with portabella
description: Grilled portabella mushroom, whole-grain rice and maple lime glaze. Vegan. Contains soy. Available after 4pm.

name: Curbside (Add to Cart for Curbside Pickup)
description: Please add car type and color in the Special Instructions box. Give us a call when you arrive.(518) 605-1004

name: Simple Salad
description: Organic baby greens, farm-made herb vinaigrette, pumpkin seeds. Very simple, very healthy.

name: Chicken Supersoup
description: House chicken soup made with high-quality ingredients. We enhance the natural health benefits of bone broth with anti-inflammatory turmeric and immune-boosting garlic and cayenne. Which also happen to make the chicken soup extra-delicious.

name: Potato Leek Soup
description: Cooked down leeks, with sauteed onions and garlic, shredded Russet potatoes cooked in vegetable stock. Then blended and finished with cream.

name: 100g Chicken
description: Enough delicious 9 Miles East roasted chicken breast to supply 100 grams of protein. Very nice to have around.

name: Stockholm GO Box Pro
description: This delicious new GO Box features nutty farro with seasoned chickpeas, carrots, blanched green beans and green cabbage. It is topped with parsley, almonds and lingonberries to give it a pop of color. Dairy-free and soy-free. Contains nuts and gluten. Vegan. Pro version has high quality chicken.

name: Stockholm GO Box
description: This delicious new GO Box features nutty farro with seasoned chickpeas, carrots, blanched green beans and green cabbage. It is topped with parsley, almonds and lingonberries to give it a pop of color. Dairy-free and soy-free. Contains nuts and gluten. Vegan.

name: Valencia GO Box
description: Valencia is a sunny Spanish-style box made with carrots, roasted sweet peppers, peas, olives, chickpeas, whole-grain rice and our organic baby greens blend. The sherry vinaigrette brings it all together. Vegan and gluten-free.

name: Valencia Pro GO Box with chicken
description: Valencia is a sunny Spanish-style box made with high-quality chicken, carrots, roasted sweet peppers, peas, mild Castelvatrano Spanish olives, chickpeas, whole-grain rice and our organic baby greens blend. The sherry vinaigrette brings it all together. Gluten-free.

name: Tzatziki
description: House-made Greek cucumber yogurt tzatziki spread

name: "Indecision" Meal Deal
description: One Farmhouse pizza, four pieces of grilled chicken over garlic mashed root veg, a simple salad with organic baby greens and herb vinaigrette, and two almond cookies (or a chia pudding)

name: Side of tomato sauce
description: Our house-made tomato sauce.

name: Side of 9 Miles East hot sauce
description: House-made probiotic hot sauce.

name: Side of Green Magic dressing
description: Our popular house-made salad dressing

name: Farmhouse Pizza
description: Three-day sourdough crust made with Farmer Ground flour from Ithaca, local mozzarella cheese and tomato sauce made with tomatoes and herbs from 9 Miles East Farm and our friends' farms in season.

name: Seasons pizza: Hot Honey
description: Farm-made tomato sauce, local mozzarella, and spicy/sweet hot honey on our three-day sourdough crust.

name: Vegan Grilled Veg Pizza
description:
Grilled summer squash, sweet peppers, broccoli & cauliflower, white bean puree (because most vegan cheese is rubbery and terrible), house tomato sauce

Three-day sourdough crust made with Farmer Ground flour from Ithaca.

name: Barnyard Pizza
description: Local Italian sausage, house tomato sauce, creamy mozzarella, three-day sourdough crust made with Farmer Ground flour from Ithaca

name: Seasons Pizza: Sauteed mushroom
description:
Classic mushroom pizza: freshly sauteed mushrooms, creamy mozzarella, farm-made tomato sauce

Three-day sourdough crust made with Farmer Ground flour from Ithaca.

name: Vegan Farmhouse Pizza
description:
Three-day sourdough crust made with Farmer Ground flour from Ithaca, Provencal-style white bean puree in place of cheese, and house tomato sauce.

Note that there is a small amount of honey in our crust to feed the sourdough culture.

name: San Marzano Margherita
description:
Fancy Italian tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, fresh basil.

Three-day sourdough crust made with Farmer Ground flour from Ithaca.

name: Side of hot honey
description: House-made spicy honey.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Nitrate-free pepperoni from Black River Smokehouse, house tomato sauce, creamy mozzarella, three-day sourdough crust made with Farmer Ground flour

name: Grilled Vegetable Pizza
description:
Grilled summer squash, sweet peppers, broccoli & cauliflower, mozzarella, house tomato sauce

Three-day sourdough crust made with Farmer Ground flour from Ithaca.

name: Gluten free: Sauteed mushroom
description:
Sauteed mushrooms, farm-made tomato sauce, local mozzarella.

Gluten free crust from Saratoga Gluten Free Goods.

name: Gluten-free Barnyard pizza
description: Gluten-free crust from Saratoga Gluten Free Goods, plus local mozzarella, farm-made tomato sauce and crumbled local Italian sausage.

name: Gluten-free Farmhouse pizza
description: Gluten-free crust from Saratoga Gluten Free Goods, plus local mozzarella cheese, farm-made tomato sauce and fresh herbs sprinkled on top.

name: Gluten-free Seasons Pizza: Margherita
description: Pizza Margherita is a true test of ingredients and technique. The pizza is so simple that everything has to be perfect for it to work. But when it does, there's nothing so pure and delicious. Margherita starts with our 3-day, cold-fermented sourdough crust. We add farm-made tomato sauce, creamy Maplebrook Farm fresh mozzarella, and fresh basil. That's it.

name: Gluten-free Seasons Pizza: The Works
description: Local Italian sausage, sweet peppers, onion & sauteed mushroom. Gluten-free crust, house tomato sauce, and local mozzarella

name: Gluten-Free Season: Grilled Veg
description:
Charcoal-grilled fresh vegetables.

Guten-free crust from Saratoga Gluten Free Goods, plus local mozzarella cheese and house tomato sauce.

name: Seasons Pizza: The Works
description: Local Italian sausage, sweet peppers, onion & sauteed mushroom. Three-day sourdough crust, house tomato sauce, and local mozzarella

name: Gluten-free, dairy-free pizza
description: Provencal-style white bean puree in place of cheese, and house tomato sauce. Please note there is egg in the GF crust.

name: Seasons pizza: Vermont Prosciutto & fresh herbs
description: Local prosciutto ham, fresh herbs, mozzarella, house tomato sauce, three-day cold-fermented sourdough crust.

name: Roasted Red Pepper & Spinach Christmas Pizza
description: It's red. It's green. Merry Christmas. Local mozzarella, house tomato sauce. Three-day naturally leavened sourdough crust made with organic Farmer Ground Flour.

name: Sparkling Saratoga Water
description: A liter of refreshing local water in the iconic blue glass bottle.

name: Almond Cookie
description: Gluten-free almond cookie with a soft center and crunchy contrast from nuts and seeds. Vegan and gluten-free but much more delicious than that might otherwise suggest.

name: Day-old Sourdough Loaf
description: House-baked sourdough loaves perfect for sandwiches and toast. Local organic flour. No commercial yeast. The real deal.

name: Sourdough Loaf
description: House-baked sourdough loaves perfect for sandwiches and toast. Local organic flour. No commercial yeast. The real deal.

name: Oatmeal Raisin Cookie
description: Perfect texture

name: Rye Chocolate Chip Cookie
description: Grownup brown-butter version of the cookie classic.

name: Dozen fresh local eggs
description: From healthy pastured chickens. Great flavor, bright orange yolks.

name: Local wildflower honey
description: Glass jars of pure, raw local honey.

name: Espresso & Cocoa Nib Granola
description: From the farm kitchen, 9 Miles East very own granola with seeds, nuts, coconut, coffee beans, cocoa nibs, maple syrup, cinnamon and oats. GF, DF, SF. Vegan.

name: Sweet Italian Sausage
description: Like our Barnyard pizza? Now you can enjoy the same great local sausage at home. One pound package of sweet Italian sausage from our friends at Grazin Acres Farm. The very best. Delivered frozen.

name: Butter
description: One pound brick of fresh butter

name: Farm-made Sourdough Loaf
description: Our own crusty sourdough loaves. Made with local organic flour.

name: 100g Chicken
description: Enough delicious 9 Miles East roasted chicken breast to supply 100 grams of protein. Very nice to have around.

name: Okinawa GO Basket
description: This super delicious — and super healthy — meal features soy-glazed sweet potato, crumbled tofu, scallion, spinach and whole-grain buckwheat. Topped with soy ginger miso and sesame seeds. Gluten free and dairy free. Heat & enjoy.

name: Okinawa Go Basket Pro
description: Okinawa-style buckwheat bowl with roasted miso-glazed sweet potatoes and antibiotic-free chicken. Designed to be heated in the microwave or on the stove top.

name: "Indecision" Meal Deal
description: One Farmhouse pizza, four pieces of grilled chicken over garlic mashed root veg (2 piri piri, 2 lemon rosemary), a simple salad with organic baby greens and herb vinaigrette, and two house-baked desserts.

name: Blood Sugar Management Meal Bundle
description: Five meals designed to make it easy for people with pre-diabetes and Type 2 diabetes to follow generally accepted nutrition guidelines for managing their condition. Includes, entree, salads, soups, and bowls. Weekly subscriptions available for home and workplace delivery at a discounted rate by texting A1C to 518 310-5053.

name: Heart Health Meal Bundle
description: Five meals designed to make it easy for people to follow  American Heart Association dietary guidelines. Includes, entree, salads, soups, and bowls. Weekly subscriptions available for home and workplace delivery at a discounted rate by texting HEART to 518 310-5053.
